feed.title: haowaiwai
feed.subtitle: Write an awesome description for your new site here. You can edit this line in _config.yml. It will appear in your document head meta (for Google search results) and in your feed.xml site description.

entry.title: elasticsearch
entry.content:
yum install java-1.8.0-openjdk
java -version
rpm --import https://artifacts.elastic.co/GPG-KEY-elasticsearch
vi /etc/yum.repos.d/elasticsearch.repo
[elasticsearch-6.x]
name=Elasticsearch repository for 6.x packages
baseurl=https://artifacts.elastic.co/packages/6.x/yum
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=https://artifacts.elastic.co/GPG-KEY-elasticsearch
enabled=1
autorefresh=1
type=rpm-md
yum install elasticsearch

curl 'http://localhost:9200/station/request/20180825090521'
curl 'localhost:9200/station/request/_search?pretty=true'
entry.summary: ``` yum install java-1.8.0-openjdk java -version rpm –import https://artifacts.elastic.co/GPG-KEY-elasticsearch vi /etc/yum.repos.d/elasticsearch.repo [elasticsearch-6.x] name=Elasticsearch repository for 6.x packages baseurl=https://artifacts.elastic.co/packages/6.x/yum gpgcheck=1 gpgkey=https://artifacts.elastic.co/GPG-KEY-elasticsearch enabled=1 autorefresh=1 type=rpm-md yum install elasticsearch

entry.title: centos ffmepg
entry.content:
yum -y install epel-release
rpm -Uvh https://download1.rpmfusion.org/free/el/rpmfusion-free-release-7.noarch.rpm
yum -y install ffmpeg
entry.summary: yum -y install epel-release rpm -Uvh https://download1.rpmfusion.org/free/el/rpmfusion-free-release-7.noarch.rpm yum -y install ffmpeg

entry.title: centos gcc
entry.content:
sudo yum install centos-release-scl
sudo yum install devtoolset-7-gcc*
scl enable devtoolset-7 bash
which gcc
gcc --version
entry.summary: sudo yum install centos-release-scl sudo yum install devtoolset-7-gcc* scl enable devtoolset-7 bash which gcc gcc --version

entry.title: linux cmd
entry.content:
ip route del 192.168.7.0/24 via 1.0.0.1 dev ppp0

route add -host 192.168.7.1 dev ppp0

ip addr add 192.168.10.100/24 dev en0
ifconfig en0 add 192.168.10.100/24

tcpdump -i eth0 '(((src host 115.47.154.235)))'
echo "c myvpn" > /var/run/xl2tpd/l2tp-control
xl2tpd -D -c /etc/xl2tpd/xl2tpd.conf
ipsec auto --up ikev1
ipsec auto --down ikev1

iptables -t nat -N zone_wan_nat_ppp
iptables -t nat -A POSTROUTING --o ppp0 -j zone_wan_nat_ppp
iptables -t nat -F zone_wan_nat_ppp
iptables -t nat -A zone_wan_nat_ppp -s 192.168.10.0/24 -j SNAT --to-source 192.168.7.60
entry.summary: ``` ip route del 192.168.7.0/24 via 1.0.0.1 dev ppp0

entry.title: 2017 hot movie
entry.content:
摔跤吧！爸爸

战狼2

entry.summary: 摔跤吧！爸爸 芳华 战狼2 敦刻尔克 无问西东

entry.title: Uninstall ubuntu kernel!
entry.content:
dpkg --get-selections|grep linux
uname -a
sudo apt-get remove ***
dpkg --get-selections | grep deinstall | sed 's/deinstall/\lpurge/' | sudo dpkg --set-selections; sudo dpkg -Pa
entry.summary: dpkg --get-selections|grep linux uname -a sudo apt-get remove *** dpkg --get-selections | grep deinstall | sed 's/deinstall/\lpurge/' | sudo dpkg --set-selections; sudo dpkg -Pa

entry.title: Uninstall federa kernel!
entry.content:
rpm -qa | grep kernel
sudo dnf remove ***
entry.summary: rpm -qa | grep kernel sudo dnf remove ***
